scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version patch && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version minor && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.version:major: npm version major && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version major && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish: cd dist/zmaterial/ && npm publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.dist:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
scripts.dist:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
scripts.dist:major: npm run version:major && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
scripts.start: npm run build:prod && npm i --save dist/zmaterial && ng serve
scripts.test:local: npm run build:prod && cd dist/zmaterial/ && npm pack && cd .. && cd ..
